text: Marina Abramović (, ; born November 30, 1946) is a Yugoslav-born Serbian- American performance artist and art filmmaker. Her work are about body art, endurance art and feminist art, the relationship between performer and audience. Her career began in the 1970s. Abramović calls herself the "grandmother of performance art". Abramović was born in Belgrade, Serbia. She was known for having a relationship with artist Ulay. She lives in New York City. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Yugoslavian artists Category:American feminists Category:American painters Category:American sculptors Category:Artists from New York City Category:American philanthropists Category:Conceptual artists Category:Dutch artists Category:Movie producers Category:Artists from Belgrade Category:Royal Academicians Category:20th-century artists Category:21st-century artists
title: Marina Abramović
